document.docAuthor: Peng, Ling-Fei, Wang, Ying-Lun & Zhang, Ya-Lin
document.docTitle: Pseudoseliza Peng, Wang & Zhang, 2010, gen. n.
document.masterDocTitle: A new genus and one new species of the Tribe Selizini (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Flatidae) from China, with a checklist of the tribe from the Oriental Region

subSubSection.paragraph:

sp. n.
